info.name: GIRIK BACKEND - Full Role-Based API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection with folders per role. Admin folder contains every API in subfolders by module. Use Authentication to login; token is saved.

variable.description: Run GET /certificates/types (Client folder) and copy id from response

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Login first; token is saved automatically. Use this token for all role folders.

exec: const d = pm.response.json(); if (d.token) pm.collectionVariables.set("token", d.token);

item.name: Admin
item.description: All APIs ADMIN can access. Subfolders grouped by module.
